title: 1999/555/EC: Commission Decision of 22 July 1999 recognising in principle the completeness of the dossiers submitted for detailed examination in view of the possible inclusion of BAS 656H (dimethenamid-p AC 900001(picolinafen), ZA 1963 (picoxystrobin) in Annex I to Council Directive 91/414/EEC concerning the placing of plant-protection products on the market (notified under document number C(1999) 2276) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION
of 22 July 1999
recognising in principle the completeness of the dossiers submitted for detailed examination in view of the possible inclusion of BAS 656H (dimethenamid-p AC 900001(picolinafen), ZA 1963 (picoxystrobin) in Annex I to Council Directive 91/414/EEC concerning the placing of plant-protection products on the market
(notified under document number C(1999) 2276)
(Text with EEA relevance)
(1999/555/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 July 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 230, 19.8.1991, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 21, 28.1.1999, p. 21.
